updates.description: SharePoint Syntex uses advanced AI and machine teaching to amplify human expertise, automate content processing, and transform content into knowledge. It delivers innovative experiences across Microsoft 365 and Project Cortex.
updates.automation_value: SharePoint Syntex can save time by automating content processing and transforming content into knowledge. It can also reduce manual work by using AI to amplify human expertise.
updates.business_impact: This feature will help businesses to automate their content processing and leverage AI to enhance their expertise. It will also help in transforming content into knowledge, thus improving decision making and productivity.

updates.description: SharePoint Spaces is an immersive, mixed reality experience that allows you to create and view, 3D, 360° tours, and more. It's integrated with Microsoft's AI and mixed reality capabilities.
updates.automation_value: SharePoint Spaces can save time by creating immersive experiences that can be used for training, product development, and more. It can also reduce manual work by integrating with Microsoft's AI and mixed reality capabilities.
updates.business_impact: This feature will help businesses to create immersive experiences for training and product development, thus reducing the time and effort required. The integration with Microsoft's AI and mixed reality capabilities will also enhance the user experience.

updates.description: SharePoint Home Sites is a landing page for your organization that brings together news, events, content, and conversations. It's personalized and relevant to each user, and it's integrated with Microsoft Search and Office 365.
updates.automation_value: SharePoint Home Sites can save time by bringing together relevant information in one place. It can also reduce manual work by personalizing content for each user and integrating with Microsoft Search and Office 365.
updates.business_impact: This feature will help businesses to bring all relevant information in one place, thus improving productivity. The personalization of content and integration with Microsoft Search and Office 365 will also enhance the user experience.

updates.description: SharePoint Server Subscription Edition is the latest version of SharePoint Server. It's designed for businesses that need to keep some or all of their data on-premises. It includes all the features of SharePoint Server 2019, plus new capabilities for modern teamwork, modern sites, and more.
updates.automation_value: SharePoint Server Subscription Edition can save time by providing new capabilities for modern teamwork and sites. It can also reduce manual work by including all the features of SharePoint Server 2019.
updates.business_impact: This feature will help businesses to modernize their teamwork and sites, thus improving productivity. The inclusion of all features of SharePoint Server 2019 will also ensure continuity and enhance the user experience.

results.raw_output:
1. Update Name: SharePoint Syntex
   Release Date: November 2023
   Description: SharePoint Syntex uses advanced AI and machine teaching to amplify human expertise, automate content processing, and transform content into knowledge. It delivers innovative experiences across Microsoft 365 and Project Cortex.
   Automation Value: SharePoint Syntex can save time by automating content processing and transforming content into knowledge. It can also reduce manual work by using AI to amplify human expertise.

2. Update Name: SharePoint Spaces
   Release Date: March 2024
   Description: SharePoint Spaces is an immersive, mixed reality experience that allows you to create and view, 3D, 360° tours, and more. It's integrated with Microsoft's AI and mixed reality capabilities.
   Automation Value: SharePoint Spaces can save time by creating immersive experiences that can be used for training, product development, and more. It can also reduce manual work by integrating with Microsoft's AI and mixed reality capabilities.

3. Update Name: SharePoint Home Sites
   Release Date: June 2024
   Description: SharePoint Home Sites is a landing page for your organization that brings together news, events, content, and conversations. It's personalized and relevant to each user, and it's integrated with Microsoft Search and Office 365.
   Automation Value: SharePoint Home Sites can save time by bringing together relevant information in one place. It can also reduce manual work by personalizing content for each user and integrating with Microsoft Search and Office 365.

4. Update Name: SharePoint Server Subscription Edition
   Release Date: September 2025
   Description: SharePoint Server Subscription Edition is the latest version of SharePoint Server. It's designed for businesses that need to keep some or all of their data on-premises. It includes all the features of SharePoint Server 2019, plus new capabilities for modern teamwork, modern sites, and more.
   Automation Value: SharePoint Server Subscription Edition can save time by providing new capabilities for modern teamwork and sites. It can also reduce manual work by including all the features of SharePoint Server 2019.
